## codemod() function

Perform a codemod on a set of files.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function codemod(pathToCodemod: string, inputFilesPatterns: string[], passedOptions?: Options): Promise<CodemodMetaResult[] | string[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pathToCodemod | string | file path to the codemod to run. This file's export must match the Codemod type. |
|  inputFilesPatterns | string\[\] | files to transform |
|  passedOptions | [Options](./jscodemod.options.md) | options for the codemod |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;CodemodMetaResult\[\] \| string\[\]&gt;
